sub_title: ALD Automotive: making transition to e-mobility smooth sailing ⛵️
summary: Loving all things e-mobility and want to be a part of helping and seeing it evolve to a zero carbon footprint technology.

profile_positions.description:
•	Local (Croatia, Slovenia) implementation of new product - ALD Electric
•	Leading & Coordinating EURO conversion project
•	Salesforce reports and Dashboards, Sandbox operations ownership
•	JIRA ticketing regarding backend apps
•	Crystal reporting and administration
•	Business-related troubleshooting of the organisation for local users
•	Implementation support for invoicing solution 
•	EV ambassador role in a project organized by business consultancy teams 
•	Testing (user role) of Salesforce to Azure migration
•	Organizing meetings between stakeholders
•	Familiarity with regulative, requirements, the future of e-mobility
profile_positions.title: Development & e-Mobility Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Local development of ALD Electric by intense X-department cooperation
•	Defining Residual Values and Maintenance Cost for the electric vehicles market in Slovenia and 
        Croatia
•	Analyzing the Cost of Ownership/Usage for the customoer
•	Setting up the charging solution
•	Organizing presentations on e-mobility transition in Slovenia and Croatia (online and face-to-face)
•	Consulting clients about optimal solution for their fleet regarding charging, EV selection, providing them with a full package to go electric (from the vehicle to the charging solution)
•	Attending major events regarding e-mobility
•	Coordinating partnership with local CPO providers (Slovenia, Croatia)
•	Set the work instructions for implementation of electric fleet
•	Training material for fleet managers and first time EV users
•	International cooperation with e-mobility teams
profile_positions.title: Pricing and Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Daily communication with clients to resolve scheduled and ad-hoc needs
•	Approving and authorizing that the invoices are aligned with agreed service level
•	Keeping track of communication in CRM (Salesforce)
•	Coordinating and executing requests between Operations department, Sales Departement and Suppliers
•	Controlling that agreements made between the company and suppliers are followed-thru and percise
•	Making sure the assignments made by the Company towards suppliers were executed in agreed manner
•	Providing best service for the client and making sure all their needs regarding full-service leasing were met
profile_positions.title: Service Expert

profile_positions.description:
•	Drive order managment for key accounts, supporting order process
•	Reporting and providing overview within company and externally, with special focus on past and actual performance to ensure correct forecasting
•	Maintaining customers' performance
•	Driving the relationship with the customer through constant comunication, maintaining proactive approach and resolving issues on regular basis
•	Participating in X-functional projects
•	Managing inventory and distribution for the accounts
•	Ensuring that profitable sales volume and strategic objective targets are met for the Key Accounts
profile_positions.title: Account Operations Specialist Central Europe and Launch Coordinator Slovenia & Croatia

profile_positions.description:
•	Drive order managment for key accounts, supporting order process
•	Support Sales team by executing daily requests
•	Support Order entry process and participate in order entry development projects
•	Prepare the variety of reports and overviews and provide all needed information to Sales team
•	Maintain supplychain performance: on-time delivery, inventory efficiency, carrier performance
•	Support clients in resolving delivery issues
•	Coordination between Planning, Sales, Customer Operations and Marketing Team to ensure smooth Launch processes through campaigns
profile_positions.title: Customer operations representative & NikeNet Ambassador Croatia & Slovenia

profile_positions.description:
•	Customer support (hotline, email communication)
•	B2B communication
•	Website administration
•	Customer Relationship Managment
•	Supporting supply chain communication
•	Order process supervision
•	Newsletter communication to consumers
•	Website Optimization

profile_positions.title: Assistant to Manager
